title: How to download Spotify music onto your Apple Watch
content:
Music is an important element of our daily lives. Whether we’re going through unbearable heartbreaks never experienced before, celebrating moments of joy, or just winding down — there’s a music track that matches this particular mood. More notably, we tend to listen to energetic songs when we’re exercising or commuting. Apple Music supports downloading tracks

The post How to download Spotify music onto your Apple Watch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Here's a detailed, step-by-step guide on how you can download Spotify music tracks onto your Apple Watch for offline listening.
